inclusion.criterion: Must be able to give written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Be generally healthy, male or female, ages 18 to 80 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have a first degree relative with colorectal cancer under the age of 60 at the time of diagnosis
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Have previously had removed early stage colon cancer (stage I or II) without recommendation for adjuvant therapy
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Pre-menopausal women with intact female reproductive organs must have a negative pregnancy test within 2 weeks of the baseline flexible sigmoidoscopy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Must not be pregnant or lactating women and women of child bearing potential unwilling to use acceptable birth control throughout the study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Have a history or diagnosis of kidney disease, including kidney 'stones' or hypercalcemia
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Have Crohn's disease, or inflammatory bowel disease
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Have any stomach or intestinal bleeding disorders (gastrointestinal bleeding from gastric or duodenal ulcers, or gastrin secreting tumors) or active gastric / duodenal ulcers - peptic ulcer disease (without bleeding in last 3 months)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Have coagulopathy/hereditary hemorrhagic disorders/ or receiving therapeutic doses of Coumadin or heparin
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Have hereditary and familial polyposis (HNPCC/ familial adenomatous polyposis (FAP); Lynch Syndrome)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 47-year-old Asian woman complaining of persistent feelings of sadness. She lost interest in activities she used to enjoy.
